621078447293628416.text: "If we keep taking steps toward a more perfect union ... America will move forward. There's nothing we can't do." —President Obama

621078057705549824.text: "We cannot ignore the problems that we have, but we can't stop running the race." —President Obama

621077765018619904.text: "We are not perfect, but we have the capacity to be more perfect—mile after mile, step after step." —President Obama

621077540937990144.text: "Justice and redemption go hand in hand." —President Obama

621077025827090432.text: "Justice is making sure that every young person knows that they are special and their lives matter." —President Obama

621076671349702656.text: "Justice is not only the absence of oppression—it is the presence of opportunity." —President Obama

621075206434484224.text: "On Thursday, I will be the first sitting president to visit a federal prison." —President Obama

621074570049536000.text: "For nonviolent drug crimes, we need to lower long mandatory minimum sentences—or get rid of them entirely." —President Obama

621073695751041024.text: "Don't just tag them as future criminals. Reach out to them as future citizens." —President Obama

621072852284870656.text: "What doesn't make sense is treating entire neighborhoods as danger zones." —President Obama

621072623741460480.text: "We recognize that every child deserves opportunity. Not just some. Not just our own." —President Obama

621072387061067776.text: "One study found that for every dollar we invest in Pre-K, we save at least twice that in reduced crime." —President Obama

621072112178999296.text: "If we make investments early in our children, we will reduce the need to incarcerate those kids." —President Obama

621070910590615552.text: "Mass incarceration makes our country worse off—and we need to do something about it." —President Obama

621070637927301120.text: "Our criminal justice system isn't as smart as it should be." —President Obama

621069908227416064.text: "Around one million fathers are behind bars. Around one in nine African-American kids has a parent in prison." —President Obama

621069124043550720.text: "African Americans are more likely to be arrested. They are more likely to be sentenced to more time for the same crime." —President Obama

621068780286836736.text: "A growing body of research shows that people of color are more likely to be frisked, stopped, questioned, detained." —President Obama

621068484512870400.text: "African Americans and Latinos make up 30 percent of our population. They make up 60 percent of our inmates." —President Obama

621067861897777152.text: "For $80 billion we could double the salary of every high school teacher in America." —President Obama

621067727067676672.text: "Every year, we spend $80 billion to keep those folks incarcerated." —President Obama

621067509328801792.text: "In far too many cases the punishment does not fit the crime." —President Obama

621067316889960448.text: "Over the last few decades, we've locked up more and more nonviolent drug offenders for longer than ever before." —President Obama

621066084616028160.text: "The United States is home to 5 percent of the world's population, but 25 percent of the world's prisoners." —President Obama

621065004716941312.text: "In too many cases our criminal justice system becomes a pipeline from underfunded schools to overcrowded jails." —President Obama

621064684246970368.text: "There is a long history of inequity in the criminal justice system in America." —President Obama

621062874534797312.text: "Health care is not a privilege for the few, but a right for all of us." —President Obama

621061331219709952.text: "Let's get something out of the way up front: I am not singing today." —President Obama

616687551475269632.text: "If we're walking down that road together, we're going to get there faster." —President Obama

616687179230760960.text: "The last seven years—shoot, the last seven days—should remind us there's nothing America cannot do." —President Obama

616686426290290688.text: "No middle-class family should be priced out of the education that they need." —President Obama

616686154159628288.text: "In America, a hard day's work deserves a fair day's pay." —President Obama

616685679494475776.text: "This is an issue of basic fairness: If you work longer and you work harder, you should get paid for it." —President Obama #FixOvertime

616684952550273024.text: "We're stronger together than we are by ourselves." —President Obama

616684692495028224.text: "Folks forget sometimes—unions are what helped bring about the 40-hour work week." —President Obama

616684360624947200.text: "We need to boost the minimum wage. Give America a raise." —President Obama #RaiseTheWage

616683893224308736.text: "The bottom line is: Top-down economics doesn't work. Middle-class economics works." —President Obama

616683371402498048.text: "We've been talking about the middle class since before it was cool." —President Obama

616681697946521600.text: "Today our high school graduation rate is at an all-time high." —President Obama

616681035561074688.text: "And by the way, our teachers are underpaid." —President Obama

616680589769486336.text: "We've got to make folks feel like their hard work is getting them somewhere." —President Obama #FixOvertime

616680268548718592.text: "12.8 million new jobs, and that's good—but we've got more work to do." —President Obama

616679900615942144.text: "All told, we've now seen 64 straight months of private-sector job growth, which is a new record." —President Obama

616678856070664192.text: "The freedom to marry who you love—that's now open to all of us. That's a good thing." —President Obama #LoveWins

616678523739197440.text: "It's been a remarkable few weeks in America." —President Obama

616678015838384128.text: "No matter where you live, this is a special time of year to be an American." —President Obama

293418746826088448.text: The full text of President Obama's second inaugural address:http://OFA.BO/Hq4o8f

293405590468845568.text: Thank you, God Bless you, and may He forever bless these United States of America.

293405547682734080.text: Let us answer the call of history, and carry into an uncertain future that precious light of freedom. —President Obama

293405406661857280.text: You and I, as citizens, have the obligation to shape the debates of our time.

293405372021108736.text: You and I, as citizens, have the power to set this country’s course.

293405072929484800.text: We must act, knowing that our work will be imperfect. —President Obama

293405024229404672.text: We cannot mistake absolutism for principle, or substitute spectacle for politics, or treat name-calling as reasoned debate.

293404694401929216.text: Our journey is not complete until all our children know that they are cared for, and cherished, and always safe from harm.

293404594669760512.text: Our journey is not complete until we find a better way to welcome the immigrants who still see America as a land of opportunity.

293404518945783808.text: Our journey is not complete until no citizen is forced to wait for hours to exercise the right to vote.

293404447453872128.text: Our journey is not complete until our gay brothers and sisters are treated like anyone else under the law.

293404415535239168.text: Our journey is not complete until our wives, our mothers, and daughters can earn a living equal to their efforts.

293404203659964416.text: We, the people, declare today that the most evident of truths—that all of us are created equal—is the star that guides us still.

293403623084404736.text: We, the people, still believe that enduring security and lasting peace do not require perpetual war.

293403304124366848.text: We will respond to the threat of climate change, knowing that the failure to do so would betray our children and future generations.

293403039295995904.text: We do not believe that in this country, freedom is reserved for the lucky, or happiness for the few.

293402940637597696.text: We, the people, still believe that every citizen deserves a basic measure of security and dignity. —President Obama

293402466354077696.text: We, the people, understand that our country cannot succeed when a shrinking few do very well and a growing many barely make it.

293402393025077248.text: We are made for this moment, and we will seize it—so long as we seize it together. —President Obama

293402263777587200.text: A decade of war is now ending. An economic recovery has begun. —President Obama

293402177140056064.text: Now, more than ever, we must do these things together, as one nation and one people. —President Obama

293401934436659200.text: We have always understood that when times change, so must we. —President Obama

198833682134482944.text: President Obama: “We will finish what we started. We’re still fired up. We’re still ready to go.” #Obama2012

198833351866593280.text: "It’s still about ordinary people who believe that in the face of the greatest odds, we can make a difference in the life of this country."

198832920289488896.text: "When you decide that it’s time for change to happen, guess what. Change happens."

198832736121782272.text: POTUS: "If there’s one thing that we learned in 2008, it’s that nothing is more powerful than millions of voices calling for change."

198832464351858688.text: President Obama: "The real question is not just about how we’re doing today, but about how we’ll be doing tomorrow."

198831523405905920.text: POTUS: "It’s time to stop denying citizenship to responsible young people just because they’re the children of undocumented immigrants."

198831266420887552.text: POTUS: “I want women to control their own health choices, just like I want my daughters to have the same opportunities as your sons.”

198830648260182016.text: "As long as I’m President, I will never allow Medicare to be turned into a voucher that would end the program as we know it."

198830033563959296.text: POTUS: "No one who fights for this country should have to fight for a job or a roof over their heads when they come home."

198829802206150656.text: President Obama: "By 2014, the war in Afghanistan will be over."

198829579153055744.text: President Obama: "For the first time in nine years, there are no Americans fighting in Iraq."

198829453516869632.text: "Let’s double down on a clean energy future that’s never been more promising for our economy, our security, & for the safety of our planet."

198829204891123712.text: "I want to stop rewarding businesses that ship jobs & profits overseas, & start rewarding companies that create jobs right here in the USA."

198829020668903424.text: POTUS: "In the 21st century, higher education can’t be a luxury—it’s an economic imperative that every American should be able to afford."

198828638727176192.text: "But that’s not an excuse to tell the vast majority of responsible, hardworking Americans, 'You’re on your own.'"

198828552722972672.text: "Not every regulation is smart. Not every tax dollar is spent wisely. Not every person can be helped who refuses to help themselves."

198827771844247552.text: President Obama: "I don’t care how many ways you try to explain it: Corporations aren’t people. People are people."

198826691752230912.text: "We have come too far to abandon the change we fought for these past few years. We have to move forward."

198826584923312128.text: "This is not just another election. This is a make-or-break moment for the middle class."—President Obama

198823762672619520.text: .@MichelleObama: "That’s what I think about when I tuck my girls in at night. I think about the world I want to leave for them."

198823035837480960.text: "Barack cannot do this alone … he never has. We have always moved this country forward together."—First Lady @MichelleObama

162011128791175168.text: "Our journey moves forward, our future is hopeful, and the state of our Union will always be strong." #SOTU

162011038701731840.text: "As long as we’re joined in common purpose, as long as we maintain our common resolve..."

162010894086307840.text: "This nation is great because we worked as a team. This nation is great because we get each other’s backs."

162010839589720064.text: "No one built this country on their own. This nation is great because we built it together."

162010203678703616.text: President Obama: "Those of us who’ve been sent here to serve can learn from the service of our troops."

162010042617446400.text: "Tonight, I’m proposing a Veterans Job Corps that will help our communities hire veterans as cops and firefighters."

162009843178283008.text: "As they come home, we must serve them as well as they've served us." #SOTU

162009751968952320.text: "Above all, our freedom endures because of the men and women in uniform who defend it."

162009199931424768.text: "Anyone who tells you that America is in decline or that our influence has waned doesn’t know what they’re talking about." #SOTU

162008599248388096.text: "We will support policies that lead to strong and stable democracies and open markets, because tyranny is no match for liberty."

162007973391114240.text: "With or without this Congress, I will keep taking actions that help the economy grow. But I can do a whole lot more with your help."

162007239664734208.text: "Send me a bill that bans insider trading by members of Congress, and I will sign it tomorrow." #SOTU

162007154461650944.text: "Some of this has to do with the corrosive influence of money in politics."

162006278380601344.text: "On the other hand, if you make under $250,000 a year, like 98% of American families, your taxes shouldn’t go up."

162006122662858752.text: "Tax reform should follow the Buffett rule: If you make more than $1 million a year, you should not pay less than 30% in taxes."

162005913119633408.text: "Do we want to keep these tax cuts for the wealthiest Americans? Or do we want to keep our investments in everything else?"

162005746949685248.text: "Right now, Warren Buffett pays a lower tax rate than his secretary."

162005535619690496.text: "So let’s agree right here, right now: No side issues. No drama. Pass the payroll tax cut without delay."

162004778476503040.text: "And I will not go back to the days when Wall Street was allowed to play by its own set of rules." #SOTU

162004633122914304.text: "I will not go back to the days when health insurance companies had unchecked power to cancel your policy."

162004140283789312.text: "It’s time to apply the same rules from top to bottom: No bailouts, no handouts, and no copouts."

162004088052121600.text: "Millions of Americans who work hard and play by the rules every day deserve a government and a financial system that do the same."

162003786716545024.text: "I’m sending this Congress a plan that gives every responsible homeowner the chance to save about $3,000 a year on their mortgage."

162002605889961984.text: President Obama: "I will not walk away from the promise of clean energy." #SOTU

162001380830220288.text: "That means women should earn equal pay for equal work." #SOTU

162001310080704512.text: "An economy built to last is one where we encourage the talent and ingenuity of every person in this country."

162000943695675392.text: "We should be working on comprehensive immigration reform right now." #SOTU

161999088190099456.text: "Join me in a national commitment to train two million Americans with skills that will lead directly to a job."

161998825320480768.text: "I’m announcing the creation of a Trade Enforcement Unit charged with investigating unfair trading practices in countries like China."

161998138402541568.text: "It is time to stop rewarding businesses that ship jobs overseas, and start rewarding companies that create jobs right here in America."

161997079256903680.text: "The state of our Union is getting stronger. And we’ve come too far to turn back now."

161996944351297536.text: "In the last 22 months, businesses have created more than three million jobs."

161996306951311360.text: "Or we can restore an economy where everyone gets a fair shot, everyone does their fair share, & everyone plays by the same set of rules."

161996179926827008.text: "We can either settle for a country where a shrinking number of people do really well, while a growing number of Americans barely get by."

144140186845052928.text: The President: "A strong middle class can only exist in an economy where everyone plays by the same rules, from Wall Street to Main Street."

144139562237698048.text: "This isn’t about class warfare. This is about the nation’s welfare."—President Obama

144139433799725056.text: "It's wrong for Warren Buffett’s secretary to pay a higher tax rate than Warren Buffett."—President Obama

144138147494756352.text: "If we want a strong middle class, then our tax code must reflect our values."—President Obama

45484103885262848.text: As a nation, we have a moral and economic imperative to give every child the chance to succeed.

40170419906543616.text: Small businesses help drive America’s economic growth and create new jobs. When our small businesses do well, then America does well.

37203172820787200.text: As we cut what we can afford to do without, we have a responsibility to invest in areas that will have the biggest impact on our future.

37199818023645184.text: When I was sworn in, I pledged to cut the deficit in half by the end of my first term. The budget I’m proposing today meets that pledge.

36496015578112000.text: On Monday, I’m proposing a new budget that will help us live within our means while investing in our future. http://OFA.BO/u6HZf1

36193599439769600.text: Robert Gibbs has been an extraordinary press secretary—and I couldn’t have had a better friend at the podium each and every day.

36182034925752320.text: Today belongs to the people of Egypt, who have made it clear that nothing less than genuine democracy will carry the day. http://OFA.BO/uu4L

34766628671459328.text: RT @whitehouse: "Advise the Advisor": New series explains what the President’s up to, asks for your ideas. Plouffe up 1st: http://wh.gov/xcY

34670212812902400.text: We have to renew people’s faith in the promise of this country together: business & government, workers & CEOs, Democrats & Republicans.

33983486335389696.text: Our government has an obligation to make sure that America is the best place on Earth to do business. http://OFA.BO/upVpat

33578109542338560.text: Making buildings more energy-efficient is one of the fastest, cheapest ways to save money, combat pollution & create jobs.  http://OFA.BO/pD

33255606122971136.text: I send my best wishes for peace, prosperity, and good health to all who celebrate the Lunar New Year across the U.S. and around the world.

31384317666004992.text: We can win the future—by unleashing the talent and ingenuity of businesses and workers in every corner of this country. http://OFA.BO/Knsf5a

30100877117231104.text: It is because of our people that our future is hopeful, our journey goes forward, and the state of our union is strong. #SOTU

30100660120715264.text: From the earliest days of our founding, America has been the story of ordinary people who dare to dream. That’s how we win the future. #SOTU

30099212574138368.text: Starting this year, no American will be forbidden from serving the country they love because of who they love. #SOTU

30097791988531200.text: This July, we will begin to bring our troops home from Afghanistan. #SOTU

30096057597693952.text: We shouldn’t just give our people a government that’s more affordable. We should give them a gov't that’s more competent & efficient. #SOTU

30094546754871296.text: Every day, families sacrifice to live within their means. They deserve a government that does the same. #SOTU

30094325803130880.text: Instead of re-fighting the battles of the last two years, let’s fix what needs fixing and move forward. #SOTU

30094071406010368.text: I’m not willing to go back to the days when insurance companies could deny someone coverage because of a pre-existing condition. #SOTU

30093071953690624.text: I’m asking Democrats and Republicans to simplify the tax code. Get rid of the loopholes. Level the playing field. #SOTU

30092079392620544.text: We need the fastest, most reliable ways to move people, goods, and information—from high-speed rail to high-speed Internet. #SOTU

30091811594698752.text: I strongly believe that we should take on, once and for all, the issue of illegal immigration. #SOTU

30090963930062848.text: If you want to make a difference in the life of our nation; if you want to make a difference in the life of a child—become a teacher. #SOTU

30089655969906688.text: If we want to win the future—if we want innovation to produce jobs in America—then we also have to win the race to educate our kids. #SOTU

30089451132682240.text: Tonight I challenge you to join me in setting a new goal: by 2035, 80% of America’s electricity will come from clean energy sources. #SOTU

30089374414667776.text: Instead of subsidizing yesterday’s energy, let’s invest in tomorrow’s. #SOTU

30088662498672640.text: This is our generation’s Sputnik moment. #SOTU

30088307358568448.text: What we can do—what America does better than anyone—is spark the creativity and imagination of our people. #SOTU

30088086117425152.text: We need to out-innovate, out-educate, and out-build the rest of the world. We have to make America the best place to do business. #SOTU

30087860107350016.text: The future is ours to win. But to get there, we can’t just stand still. #SOTU

30087535224946688.text: The world has changed. The competition for jobs is real. But this shouldn’t discourage us. It should challenge us. #SOTU

30086834356756480.text: Thanks to the tax cuts we passed, Americans’ paychecks are a little bigger today. #SOTU

30086677846302720.text: We measure progress by the success of our people. By the jobs they can find and the quality of life those jobs offer. #SOTU

30086620044595200.text: Two years after the worst recession most of us have ever known...the economy is growing again. #SOTU

30086436862558208.text: We will move forward together, or not at all—for the challenges we face are bigger than party and bigger than politics. #SOTU
